entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
